review: Bought this to replace the Wii for watching Netflix & YouTube. It was easy to set up and use. We haven't had any problems with the Netflix connection dropping (a constant event when using the Wii for Netflix watching) and YouTube on the Fire TV Stick is worlds better than trying to watch YouTube on the Wii. It was time for an upgrade and I am so glad we did!
